item.description:
What do we do like to do on Xmas? Go out for Chinese food and a movie?

The possible movies choices are “Lincoln” or “Killing Them Softly.” You can indicate your choices on the Meetup site at www.meetup.com/mosaicofmassor or send them directly to Andrea's e-mail listed below.

 

After the film we’ll go out to Chang Sho, located at 1712 Massachusetts Ave., Cambridge, 02138. Visit: www.lotuscuisine.comfor more information.

Host: Andrea (anissenbaum@lycos.com) 617(469-9599) until 9:00 p.m.

MEET: 12:30 p.m. in the Lobby of Kendall Square Theatre in Cambridge, located at 1 Kendall Square, (at 355 Binney St.) Cambridge, Mass., 02139. You can park on the street or in the garage. It is also MBTA-accessible. Visitwww.landmarktheaters.com for details.

RSVP: Required by December 22nd. Snow cancels.

COST: Dinner and the movie, plus a $5.00 fee for non-members, which can be credited toward a Mosaic membership costing $25.00.
item.how_to_find_us: Check with Andrea on the plans to meet in the theatre

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Christmas Day Movie and Chinese Food.
